name: INVESTI-GATOR (FinnTess)
description:
Entry for the McGameJam 2019 sponsored by Ubisoft. Team: Something Witty - Team #16

DESCRIPTION

In INVESTI-GATOR, you play as a detective on a case to uncover the mystery of what lurks in the sewers.

Your goal is to explore the underground and bring back photographic proof of your discoveries.

Your only exit from the sewer are the ladders going up found throughout the level.

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

1 - Take out your camera

Mouse - Look-around

Left-click - Take a picture

Right-click - Zoom in and out

TEAM MEMBERS

Richard Bonneau - Programmer/Designer

Gabriel Bradley - Level Designer

Dominic Lachance-Robidoux - Designer/Artist

CREDITS
